title: 【1？#Starving】渴望？
author: 我叫坂本
txt_content:
对了你的那啥，题目里一直都有一个？，应该是用了某种特殊符号所以挂掉了
能不能换一下看着好不顺眼 ...
其实是这样的2333- xD
比如第一次发帖是1
第二次发帖是2
然后一直下去
之后我就忘记了
所以我就用问号来代替- -

标题: 【1？#Starving】渴望？ 本帖最后由 我叫坂本 于 2017-4-5 18:57 编辑 

Starving - Zedd然而这首歌不是Zedd唱的，233xD虾米音乐+无翻译http://www.xiami.com/widget/272172232_1776287057,_235_346_5695c1_457cb4_1/multiPlayer.swfYou know just what to say
Shit that scares me
I should just walk away
But I can't move my feet
The more that I know you
The more I want to
Something inside me's changed
I was so much younger yesterday
I didn't know that I was starving till I tasted you
Don't need no butterflies when you give me the whole damn zoo
By the way by the way you do things to my body
And I didn't know that I was starving till I tasted you
By the way by the way you do things to my body
I didn't know that I was starving till I tasted you
You know just how to make
